cards.title: Vehicle Categories
items: Luxurious Car Insurance - Premium coverage for high-end vehicles
SUV Insurance - Comprehensive coverage for sport utility vehicles
Normal Car Insurance - Standard coverage for regular vehicles

faqs.question: How do I make a car reservation?
faqs.answer: To book a car: 1. Select your preferred vehicle category (Luxurious, SUV, or Normal) 2. Choose pick-up and drop-off locations 3. Select rental dates and times 4. Add any additional services 5. Proceed to payment

faqs.question: How do I modify my booking?
faqs.answer: Open the 'Bookings' tab, select your active reservation, and tap 'Modify'. You can change the dates, times, or vehicle category if available.

faqs.question: What is the cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Free cancellation is available up to 24 hours before pick-up. Cancellations within 24 hours may incur a fee of one day's rental charge.

faqs.question: Can I extend my rental period?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can extend your rental through the app. Go to 'Active Rentals', select your booking, and choose 'Extend Rental'. Extensions are subject to vehicle availability.

faqs.question: Which payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: Cruzr accepts Apple Pay, Credit Card, Cash on Pick-up, and Benefit payment services.

faqs.question: When am I charged for my reservation?
faqs.answer: For Credit Card and Apple Pay bookings, a hold is placed at the time of reservation. The final charge occurs at pick-up. For Cash on Pick-up, payment is collected when you receive the vehicle.

faqs.question: What happens if I return the car late?
faqs.answer: Late returns are charged at an hourly rate of the daily price. Returns more than 3 hours late are charged a full additional day.

faqs.question: What insurance options are available?
faqs.answer: We offer three types of coverage: Luxurious Car Insurance, SUV Insurance, and Normal Car Insurance. Each provides comprehensive protection tailored to the vehicle category.

faqs.question: What does the insurance cover?
faqs.answer: Our insurance includes collision damage waiver, theft protection, third-party liability, and personal accident insurance. Specific coverage details vary by vehicle category.

faqs.question: How do I add insurance to my rental?
faqs.answer: Insurance can be added during the booking process or by modifying an existing reservation before pick-up. Select your preferred coverage level from the insurance options screen.

faqs.question: What types of vehicles are available?
faqs.answer: We offer three categories: Luxurious (premium and luxury vehicles), SUV (sport utility vehicles), and Normal (standard sedans and economy cars).

faqs.question: What's included in the rental?
faqs.answer: All rentals include basic insurance, 24/7 roadside assistance, and unlimited mileage. Additional services like GPS or child seats can be added during booking.

faqs.question: What fuel policy applies?
faqs.answer: Vehicles are provided with a full tank and should be returned full. If returned with less fuel, you'll be charged the current market rate plus a refueling service fee.

faqs.question: How do I view my rental history?
faqs.answer: Access your complete rental history in the Transaction History section. You can view past rentals, payments, and download receipts.

faqs.question: What documents do I need to rent a car?
faqs.answer: You'll need a valid driver's license, credit card in the renter's name, and a valid form of ID. For luxury vehicles, additional documentation may be required.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer service?
faqs.answer: You can reach our 24/7 support team through: 1. In-app chat 2. Email at support@cruzr.com 3. Phone at 1-800-CRUZR

faqs.question: What should I do in case of an accident?
faqs.answer: 1. Ensure everyone's safety 2. Contact local authorities if necessary 3. Document the incident with photos 4. Contact our 24/7 emergency support 5. Fill out the incident report in the app

faqs.question: What if I have mechanical issues during rental?
faqs.answer: Contact our 24/7 roadside assistance immediately. We'll either fix the issue or provide a replacement vehicle. All costs are covered under your rental agreement.
